113,TRUMP,"To fill his seat, we have chosen Judge Neil Gorsuch, a man of incredible skill and deep devotion to the law.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
114,TRUMP,"He was confirmed unanimously by the Court of Appeals, and I am asking the Senate to swiftly approve his nomination.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
115,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
116,TRUMP,"Tonight, as I outline the next steps we must take as a country, we must honestly acknowledge the circumstances we inherited.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
117,TRUMP,Ninety-four million Americans are out of the labor force.,1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
118,TRUMP,"Over 43 million people are now living in poverty, and over 43 million Americans are on food stamps.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
119,TRUMP,More than 1 in 5 people in their prime working years are not working.,1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
120,TRUMP,We have the worst financial recovery in 65 years.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
121,TRUMP,"In the last eight years, the past administration has put on more new debt than nearly all of the other Presidents combined.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

122,TRUMP,"We’ve lost more than one-fourth of our manufacturing jobs since NAFTA was approved, and we’ve lost 60,000 factories since China joined the World Trade Organization in 2001.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
123,TRUMP,Our trade deficit in goods with the world last year was nearly $800 billion dollars.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
124,TRUMP,And overseas we have inherited a series of tragic foreign policy disasters.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
125,TRUMP,Solving these and so many other pressing problems will require us to work past the differences of party.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
126,TRUMP,It will require us to tap into the American spirit that has overcome every challenge throughout our long and storied history.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

127,TRUMP,"But to accomplish our goals at home and abroad, we must restart the engine of the American economy — making it easier for companies to do business in the United States, and much, much harder for companies to leave our country.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
128,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
129,TRUMP,"Right now, American companies are taxed at one of the highest rates anywhere in the world.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
130,TRUMP,My economic team is developing historic tax reform that will reduce the tax rate on our companies so they can compete and thrive anywhere and with anyone.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
131,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
132,TRUMP,"It will be a big, big cut.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
133,TRUMP,"At the same time, we will provide massive tax relief for the middle class.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
134,TRUMP,We must create a level playing field for American companies and our workers.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
135,TRUMP,We have to do it.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
136,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
137,TRUMP,"Currently, when we ship products out of America, many other countries make us pay very high tariffs and taxes.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
138,TRUMP,"But when foreign companies ship their products into America, we charge them nothing, or almost nothing.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
139,TRUMP,"I just met with officials and workers from a great American company, Harley-Davidson.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
140,TRUMP,"In fact, they proudly displayed five of their magnificent motorcycles, made in the USA, on the front lawn of the White House.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
141,SYSTEM,(LAUGHTER),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
142,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
143,TRUMP,"And they wanted me to ride one and I said, “No, thank you.”",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
144,SYSTEM,(LAUGHTER),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
145,TRUMP,"At our meeting, I asked them, how are you doing, how is business?",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
146,TRUMP,They said that it’s good.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
147,TRUMP,"I asked them further, how are you doing with other countries, mainly international sales?",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

148,TRUMP,"They told me — without even complaining, because they have been so mistreated for so long that they’ve become used to it — that it’s very hard to do business with other countries because they tax our goods at such a high rate.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
149,TRUMP,"They said that in the case of another country, they taxed their motorcycles at 100 percent.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
150,TRUMP,They weren’t even asking for a change.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
151,TRUMP,But I am.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
152,SYSTEM,(LAUGHTER),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
153,TRUMP,I believe strongly in free trade but it also has to be fair trade.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
154,TRUMP,It’s been a long time since we had fair trade.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

155,TRUMP,"The first Republican President, Abraham Lincoln, warned that the “abandonment of the protective policy by the American government… will produce want and ruin among our people.”",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
156,TRUMP,Lincoln was right — and it’s time we heeded his advice and his words.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
157,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
158,TRUMP,I am not going to let America and its great companies and workers be taken advantage of us any longer.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
159,TRUMP,They have taken advantage of our country.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
160,TRUMP,No longer.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
161,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
162,TRUMP,I am going to bring back millions of jobs.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
163,TRUMP,Protecting our workers also means reforming our system of legal immigration.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
164,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
165,TRUMP,"The current, outdated system depresses wages for our poorest workers, and puts great pressure on taxpayers.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
166,TRUMP,"Nations around the world, like Canada, Australia and many others, have a merit-based immigration system.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
167,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
168,TRUMP,It’s a basic principle that those seeking to enter a country ought to be able to support themselves financially.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
169,TRUMP,"Yet, in America, we do not enforce this rule, straining the very public resources that our poorest citizens rely upon.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
170,TRUMP,"According to the National Academy of Sciences, our current immigration system costs America’s taxpayers many billions of dollars a year.",1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
171,TRUMP,"Switching away from this current system of lower-skilled immigration, and instead adopting a merit-based system, we will have so many more benefits.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
172,TRUMP,"It will save countless dollars, raise workers’ wages, and help struggling families — including immigrant families — enter the middle class.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
173,TRUMP,"And they will do it quickly, and they will be very, very happy, indeed.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
174,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

175,TRUMP,"I believe that real and positive immigration reform is possible, as long as we focus on the following goals:  To improve jobs and wages for Americans; to strengthen our nation’s security; and to restore respect for our laws.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

176,TRUMP,"If we are guided by the wellbeing of American citizens, then I believe Republicans and Democrats can work together to achieve an outcome that has eluded our country for decades.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
177,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

178,TRUMP,"Another Republican President, Dwight D. Eisenhower, initiated the last truly great national infrastructure program — the building of the Interstate Highway System.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
179,TRUMP,The time has come for a new program of national rebuilding.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
180,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
181,TRUMP,"America has spent approximately six trillion dollars in the Middle East, all this while our infrastructure at home is crumbling.",1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
182,TRUMP,With this six trillion dollars we could have rebuilt our country – twice.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
183,TRUMP,And maybe even three times if we had people who had the ability to negotiate.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

184,TRUMP,"To launch our national rebuilding, I will be asking Congress to approve legislation that produces a $1 trillion investment in infrastructure of the United States — financed through both public and private capital — creating millions of new jobs.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
185,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
186,TRUMP,This effort will be guided by two core principles:  buy American and hire American.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
187,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
188,TRUMP,"Tonight, I am also calling on this Congress to repeal and replace Obamacare —",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
189,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
190,TRUMP,"— with reforms that expand choice, increase access, lower costs, and, at the same time, provide better healthcare.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
191,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
192,TRUMP,Mandating every American to buy government-approved health insurance was never the right solution for our country.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
193,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
194,TRUMP,"The way to make health insurance available to everyone is to lower the cost of health insurance, and that is what we are going do.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
195,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
196,TRUMP,Obamacare premiums nationwide have increased by double and triple digits.,1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
197,TRUMP,"As an example, Arizona went up 116 percent last year alone.",1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
198,TRUMP,Governor Matt Bevin of Kentucky just said Obamacare is failing in his State — it is unsustainable and collapsing.,1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
199,TRUMP,"One-third of counties have only one insurer, and they are losing them fast.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
200,TRUMP,They are losing them so fast.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
201,TRUMP,"They are leaving, and many Americans have no choice at all.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
202,TRUMP,There’s no choice left.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
203,TRUMP,Remember when you were told that you could keep your doctor and keep your plan?,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
204,TRUMP,We now know that all of those promises have been totally broken.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
205,TRUMP,"Obamacare is collapsing, and we must act decisively to protect all Americans.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
206,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
207,TRUMP,"Action is not a choice, it is a necessity.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
208,TRUMP,So I am calling on all Democrats and Republicans in Congress to work with us to save Americans from this imploding Obamacare disaster.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
209,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
210,TRUMP,Here are the principles that should guide the Congress as we move to create a better healthcare system for all Americans:,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

211,TRUMP,"First, we should ensure that Americans with preexisting conditions have access to coverage, and that we have a stable transition for Americans currently enrolled in the healthcare exchanges.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
212,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

213,TRUMP,"Secondly, we should help Americans purchase their own coverage through the use of tax credits and expanded Health Savings Accounts — but it must be the plan they want, not the plan forced on them by our government.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
214,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
215,TRUMP,"Thirdly, we should give our great state governors the resources and flexibility they need with Medicaid to make sure no one is left out.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
216,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

217,TRUMP,"Fourth, we should implement legal reforms that protect patients and doctors from unnecessary costs that drive up the price of insurance, and work to bring down the artificially high price of drugs, and bring them down immediately.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
218,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
219,TRUMP,"And finally, the time has come to give Americans the freedom to purchase health insurance across state lines —",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
220,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
221,TRUMP,which will create a truly competitive national marketplace that will bring costs way down and provide far better care.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
222,TRUMP,So important.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
223,TRUMP,Everything that is broken in our country can be fixed.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
224,TRUMP,Every problem can be solved.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
225,TRUMP,And every hurting family can find healing and hope.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
226,TRUMP,"Our citizens deserve this, and so much more — so why not join forces and finally get the job done, and get it done right?",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
227,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
228,TRUMP,"On this and so many other things, Democrats and Republicans should get together and unite for the good of our country and for the good of the American people.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
229,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

230,TRUMP,"My administration wants to work with members in both parties to make childcare accessible and affordable, to help ensure new parents that they have paid family leave, to invest in women’s health, and to promote clean air and clear water, and to rebuild our military and our infrastructure.",1,20170228_trump_address.tsv

231,TRUMP,"True love for our people requires us to find common ground, to advance the common good, and to cooperate on behalf of every American child who deserves a much brighter future.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
232,TRUMP,"An incredible young woman is with us this evening, who should serve as an inspiration to us all.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
233,TRUMP,"Today is Rare Disease Day, and joining us in the gallery is a rare disease survivor, Megan Crowley.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
234,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
235,TRUMP,"Megan was diagnosed with Pompe disease, a rare and serious illness, when she was 15 months old.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
236,TRUMP,She was not expected to live past five.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
237,TRUMP,"On receiving this news, Megan’s dad, John, fought with everything he had to save the life of his precious child.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
238,TRUMP,"He founded a company to look for a cure, and helped develop the drug that saved Megan’s life.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
239,TRUMP,Today she is 20 years old and a sophomore at Notre Dame.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
240,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
241,TRUMP,Megan’s story is about the unbounded power of a father’s love for a daughter.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

242,TRUMP,"But our slow and burdensome approval process at the Food and Drug Administration keeps too many advances, like the one that saved Megan’s life, from reaching those in need.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
243,TRUMP,"If we slash the restraints, not just at the FDA but across our government, then we will be blessed with far more miracles just like Megan.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
244,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
245,TRUMP,"In fact, our children will grow up in a nation of miracles.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
246,TRUMP,"But to achieve this future, we must enrich the mind and the souls of every American child.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
247,TRUMP,Education is the civil rights issue of our time.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
248,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

249,TRUMP,"I am calling upon members of both parties to pass an education bill that funds school choice for disadvantaged youth, including millions of African American and Latino children.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
250,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
251,TRUMP,"These families should be free to choose the public, private, charter, magnet, religious, or home school that is right for them.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
252,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
253,TRUMP,"Joining us tonight in the gallery is a remarkable woman, Denisha Merriweather.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
254,TRUMP,"As a young girl, Denisha struggled in school and failed third grade twice.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
255,TRUMP,But then she was able to enroll in a private center for learning — a great learning center — with the help of a tax credit and a scholarship program.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
256,TRUMP,"Today, she is the first in her family to graduate, not just from high school, but from college.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
257,TRUMP,Later this year she will get her master’s degree in social work.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
258,TRUMP,We want all children to be able to break the cycle of poverty just like Denisha.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
259,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
260,TRUMP,"But to break the cycle of poverty, we must also break the cycle of violence.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
261,TRUMP,The murder rate in 2015 experienced its largest single-year increase in nearly half a century.,1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
262,TRUMP,"In Chicago, more than 4,000 people were shot last year alone, and the murder rate so far this year has been even higher.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
263,TRUMP,This is not acceptable in our society.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
264,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
265,TRUMP,"Every American child should be able to grow up in a safe community, to attend a great school, and to have access to a high-paying job.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
266,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
267,TRUMP,"But to create this future, we must work with, not against — not against — the men and women of law enforcement.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
268,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
269,TRUMP,"We must build bridges of cooperation and trust — not drive the wedge of disunity and, really, it’s what it is, division.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
270,TRUMP,"It’s pure, unadulterated division.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
271,TRUMP,We have to unify.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
272,TRUMP,Police and sheriffs are members of our community.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

273,TRUMP,"They’re friends and neighbors, they’re mothers and fathers, sons and daughters — and they leave behind loved ones every day who worry about whether or not they’ll come home safe and sound.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
274,TRUMP,We must support the incredible men and women of law enforcement.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
275,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
276,TRUMP,And we must support the victims of crime.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
277,TRUMP,I have ordered the Department of Homeland Security to create an office to serve American victims.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
278,TRUMP,The office is called VOICE — Victims of Immigration Crime Engagement.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
279,TRUMP,We are providing a voice to those who have been ignored by our media and silenced by special interests.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
280,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
281,TRUMP,Joining us in the audience tonight are four very brave Americans whose government failed them.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
282,TRUMP,"Their names are Jamiel Shaw, Susan Oliver, Jenna Oliver, and Jessica Davis.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
283,TRUMP,Jamiel’s 17-year-old son was viciously murdered by an illegal immigrant gang member who had just been released from prison.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

284,TRUMP,"Jamiel Shaw, Jr. was an incredible young man, with unlimited potential who was getting ready to go to college where he would have excelled as a great college quarterback.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
285,TRUMP,But he never got the chance.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
286,TRUMP,"His father, who is in the audience tonight, has become a very good friend of mine.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
287,TRUMP,"Jamiel, thank you.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
288,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
289,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
290,TRUMP,Also with us are Susan Oliver and Jessica Davis.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
291,TRUMP,"Their husbands, Deputy Sheriff Danny Oliver and Detective Michael Davis, were slain in the line of duty in California.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
292,TRUMP,They were pillars of their community.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
293,TRUMP,These brave men were viciously gunned down by an illegal immigrant with a criminal record and two prior deportations.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
294,TRUMP,Should have never been in our country.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
295,TRUMP,"Sitting with Susan is her daughter, Jenna.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
296,TRUMP,"Jenna, I want you to know that your father was a hero, and that tonight you have the love of an entire country supporting you and praying for you.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
297,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
298,TRUMP,"To Jamiel, Jenna, Susan and Jessica, I want you to know that we will never stop fighting for justice.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
299,TRUMP,"Your loved ones will never, ever be forgotten.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
300,TRUMP,We will always honor their memory.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
301,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

302,TRUMP,"Finally, to keep America safe, we must provide the men and women of the United States military with the tools they need to prevent war — if they must — they have to fight and they only have to win.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
303,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
304,TRUMP,"I am sending Congress a budget that rebuilds the military, eliminates the defense sequester — ",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
305,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
306,TRUMP,— and calls for one of the largest increases in national defense spending in American history.,1,20170228_trump_address.tsv
307,TRUMP,My budget will also increase funding for our veterans.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
308,TRUMP,"Our veterans have delivered for this nation, and now we must deliver for them.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
309,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
310,TRUMP,"The challenges we face as a nation are great, but our people are even greater.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
311,TRUMP,And none are greater or braver than those who fight for America in uniform.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
312,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
313,TRUMP,"We are blessed to be joined tonight by Carryn Owens, the widow of a U.S. Navy Special Operator, Senior Chief William “Ryan” Owens.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
314,TRUMP,"Ryan died as he lived:  a warrior and a hero, battling against terrorism and securing our nation.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
315,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

316,TRUMP,"I just spoke to our great General Mattis, just now, who reconfirmed that — and I quote — “Ryan was a part of a highly successful raid that generated large amounts of vital intelligence that will lead to many more victories in the future against our enemies.”",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
317,TRUMP,Ryan’s legacy is etched into eternity.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
318,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
319,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
320,TRUMP,"And Ryan is looking down, right now — you know that — and he is very happy because I think he just broke a record.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
321,SYSTEM,(LAUGHTER),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
322,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
323,TRUMP,"For as the Bible teaches us, “There is no greater act of love than to lay down one’s life for one’s friends.”",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
324,TRUMP,"Ryan laid down his life for his friends, for his country, and for our freedom.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
325,TRUMP,And we will never forget Ryan.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
326,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
327,TRUMP,"To those allies who wonder what kind of a friend America will be, look no further than the heroes who wear our uniform.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
328,TRUMP,"Our foreign policy calls for a direct, robust and meaningful engagement with the world.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
329,TRUMP,It is American leadership based on vital security interests that we share with our allies all across the globe.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
330,TRUMP,"We strongly support NATO, an alliance forged through the bonds of two world wars that dethroned fascism, and a Cold War, and defeated communism.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
331,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
332,TRUMP,But our partners must meet their financial obligations.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
333,TRUMP,"And now, based on our very strong and frank discussions, they are beginning to do just that.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
334,TRUMP,"In fact, I can tell you, the money is pouring in.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
335,TRUMP,Very nice.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
336,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

337,TRUMP,"We expect our partners — whether in NATO, the Middle East, or in the Pacific — to take a direct and meaningful role in both strategic and military operations, and pay their fair share of the cost.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
338,TRUMP,Have to do that.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
339,TRUMP,"We will respect historic institutions, but we will respect the foreign rights of all nations, and they have to respect our rights as a nation also.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
340,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
341,TRUMP,"Free nations are the best vehicle for expressing the will of the people, and America respects the right of all nations to chart their own path.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
342,TRUMP,My job is not to represent the world.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
343,TRUMP,My job is to represent the United States of America.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
344,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
345,TRUMP,"But we know that America is better off when there is less conflict, not more.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
346,TRUMP,We must learn from the mistakes of the past.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
347,TRUMP,We have seen the war and the destruction that have ravaged and raged throughout the world — all across the world.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

348,TRUMP,"The only long-term solution for these humanitarian disasters, in many cases, is to create the conditions where displaced persons can safely return home and begin the long, long process of rebuilding.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
349,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
350,TRUMP,"America is willing to find new friends, and to forge new partnerships, where shared interests align.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
351,TRUMP,"We want harmony and stability, not war and conflict.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
352,TRUMP,"We want peace, wherever peace can be found.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
353,TRUMP,America is friends today with former enemies.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
354,TRUMP,"Some of our closest allies, decades ago, fought on the opposite side of these terrible, terrible wars.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
355,TRUMP,This history should give us all faith in the possibilities for a better world.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
356,TRUMP,"Hopefully, the 250th year for America will see a world that is more peaceful, more just, and more free.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv
357,TRUMP,"On our 100th anniversary, in 1876, citizens from across our nation came to Philadelphia to celebrate America’s centennial.",0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

360,TRUMP,Remington unveiled the first typewriter.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

362,TRUMP,Thomas Edison showed an automatic telegraph and an electric pen.,0,20170228_trump_address.tsv

4,TRUMP,I would like to begin by addressing the terrorist attack in Manila.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
5,TRUMP,"We’re closely monitoring the situation, and I will continue to give updates if anything happens during this period of time.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
6,TRUMP,But it is really very sad as to what’s going on throughout the world with terror.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
7,TRUMP,Our thoughts and our prayers are with all of those affected.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

8,TRUMP,"Before we discuss the Paris Accord, I’d like to begin with an update on our tremendous — absolutely tremendous — economic progress since Election Day on November 8th.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
9,TRUMP,"The economy is starting to come back, and very, very rapidly.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
10,TRUMP,"We’ve added $3.3 trillion in stock market value to our economy, and more than a million private sector jobs.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

11,TRUMP,"I have just returned from a trip overseas where we concluded nearly $350 billion of military and economic development for the United States, creating hundreds of thousands of jobs.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
12,TRUMP,"It was a very, very successful trip, believe me.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
13,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
14,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
15,TRUMP,Thank you.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
16,TRUMP,"In my meetings at the G7, we have taken historic steps to demand fair and reciprocal trade that gives Americans a level playing field against other nations.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
17,TRUMP,"We’re also working very hard for peace in the Middle East, and perhaps even peace between the Israelis and the Palestinians.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

18,TRUMP,"Our attacks on terrorism are greatly stepped up — and you see that, you see it all over — from the previous administration, including getting many other countries to make major contributions to the fight against terror.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
19,TRUMP,"Big, big contributions are being made by countries that weren’t doing so much in the form of contribution.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

20,TRUMP,"One by one, we are keeping the promises I made to the American people during my campaign for President –- whether it’s cutting job-killing regulations; appointing and confirming a tremendous Supreme Court justice; putting in place tough new ethics rules; achieving a record reduction in illegal immigration on our southern border; or bringing jobs, plants, and factories back into the United States at numbers which no one until this point thought even possible.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
21,TRUMP,"And believe me, we’ve just begun.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
22,TRUMP,The fruits of our labor will be seen very shortly even more so.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
23,TRUMP,"On these issues and so many more, we’re following through on our commitments.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
24,TRUMP,And I don’t want anything to get in our way.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
25,TRUMP,I am fighting every day for the great people of this country.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
26,TRUMP,"Therefore, in order to fulfill my solemn duty to protect America and its citizens, the United States will withdraw from the Paris Climate Accord —",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
27,SYSTEM,(APPLAUSE),0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

28,TRUMP,"— thank you, thank you — but begin negotiations to reenter either the Paris Accord or a really entirely new transaction on terms that are fair to the United States, its businesses, its workers, its people, its taxpayers.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
29,TRUMP,So we’re getting out.,0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
30,TRUMP,"But we will start to negotiate, and we will see if we can make a deal that’s fair.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
31,TRUMP,"And if we can, that’s great.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
32,TRUMP,"And if we can’t, that’s fine.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
33,TRUMP,(APPLAUSE),0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
34,TRUMP,"As President, I can put no other consideration before the wellbeing of American citizens.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

35,TRUMP,"The Paris Climate Accord is simply the latest example of Washington entering into an agreement that disadvantages the United States to the exclusive benefit of other countries, leaving American workers — who I love — and taxpayers to absorb the cost in terms of lost jobs, lower wages, shuttered factories, and vastly diminished economic production.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

36,TRUMP,"Thus, as of today, the United States will cease all implementation of the non-binding Paris Accord and the draconian financial and economic burdens the agreement imposes on our country.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

37,TRUMP,"This includes ending the implementation of the nationally determined contribution and, very importantly, the Green Climate Fund which is costing the United States a vast fortune.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

38,TRUMP,Compliance with the terms of the Paris Accord and the onerous energy restrictions it has placed on the United States could cost America as much as 2.7 million lost jobs by 2025 according to the National Economic Research Associates.,1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

39,TRUMP,"This includes 440,000 fewer manufacturing jobs — not what we need — believe me, this is not what we need — including automobile jobs, and the further decimation of vital American industries on which countless communities rely.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
40,TRUMP,"They rely for so much, and we would be giving them so little.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

41,TRUMP,"According to this same study, by 2040, compliance with the commitments put into place by the previous administration would cut production for the following sectors:  paper down 12 percent; cement down 23 percent; iron and steel down 38 percent; coal — and I happen to love the coal miners — down 86 percent; natural gas down 31 percent.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

42,TRUMP,"The cost to the economy at this time would be close to $3 trillion in lost GDP and 6.5 million industrial jobs, while households would have $7,000 less income and, in many cases, much worse than that.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
43,TRUMP,"Not only does this deal subject our citizens to harsh economic restrictions, it fails to live up to our environmental ideals.",0,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

44,TRUMP,"As someone who cares deeply about the environment, which I do, I cannot in good conscience support a deal that punishes the United States — which is what it does -– the world’s leader in environmental protection, while imposing no meaningful obligations on the world’s leading polluters.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv
45,TRUMP,"For example, under the agreement, China will be able to increase these emissions by a staggering number of years — 13.",1,20170601_paris_climate_n.tsv

1,TRUMP,"Throughout the year, we have seen Democrats across the country uniting around a new legislative proposal that would end Medicare as we know it and take away benefits that seniors have paid for their entire lives.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv

2,TRUMP,"Dishonestly called “Medicare for All,” the Democratic proposal would establish a government-run, single-payer health care system that eliminates all private and employer-based health care plans and would cost an astonishing $32.6 trillion during its first 10 years.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv

3,TRUMP,"As a candidate, I promised that we would protect coverage for patients with pre-existing conditions and create new health care insurance options that would lower premiums.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv
4,TRUMP,"I have kept that promise, and we are now seeing health insurance premiums coming down.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv
5,TRUMP,I also made a solemn promise to our great seniors to protect Medicare.,1,20181010_medicare.tsv
6,TRUMP,That is why I am fighting so hard against the Democrats' plan that would eviscerate Medicare.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
7,TRUMP,Democrats have already harmed seniors by slashing Medicare by more than $800 billion over 10 years to pay for Obamacare.,1,20181010_medicare.tsv
8,TRUMP,"Likewise, Democrats would gut Medicare with their planned government takeover of American health care.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
9,TRUMP,The Democrats' plan threatens America's seniors.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
10,TRUMP,"The Democrats' plan means that after a life of hard work and sacrifice, seniors would no longer be able to depend on the benefits they were promised.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv

11,TRUMP,"By eliminating Medicare as a program for seniors, and outlawing the ability of Americans to enroll in private and employer-based plans, the Democratic plan would inevitably lead to the massive rationing of health care.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv
12,TRUMP,Doctors and hospitals would be put out of business.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
13,TRUMP,Seniors would lose access to their favorite doctors.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
14,TRUMP,There would be long wait lines for appointments and procedures.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
15,TRUMP,Previously covered care would effectively be denied.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
16,TRUMP,"In practice, the Democratic Party’s so-called Medicare for All would really be Medicare for None.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
17,TRUMP,"Under the Democrats' plan, today’s Medicare would be forced to die.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
18,TRUMP,The Democrats' plan also would mean the end of choice for seniors over their own health care decisions.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
19,TRUMP,"Instead, Democrats would give total power and control over seniors’ health care decisions to the bureaucrats in Washington, D.C.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
20,TRUMP,"My family escaped socialism, now my fellow Democrats think we should move the party in its direction.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv

21,TRUMP,The first thing the Democratic plan will do to end choice for seniors is eliminate Medicare Advantage plans for about 20 million seniors as well as eliminate other private health plans that seniors currently use to supplement their Medicare coverage.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
22,TRUMP,"Next, the Democrats would eliminate every American’s private and employer-based health plan.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
23,TRUMP,It is right there in their proposed legislation: Democrats outlaw private health plans that offer the same benefits as the government plan.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv

24,TRUMP,"Americans might think that such an extreme, anti-senior, anti-choice and anti-consumer proposal for government-run health care would find little support among Democrats in Congress.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv

25,TRUMP,"Unfortunately, they would be wrong: 123 Democrats in the House of Representatives — 64 percent of House Democrats — as well as 15 Democrats in the Senate have already formally co-sponsored this legislation.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv

27,TRUMP,Democrats want open-borders socialism.,1,20181010_medicare.tsv
28,TRUMP,The truth is that the centrist Democratic Party is dead.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv

30,TRUMP,"If Democrats win control of Congress this November, we will come dangerously closer to socialism in America.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv

34,TRUMP,"Virtually everywhere it has been tried, socialism has brought suffering, misery and decay.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv

35,TRUMP,"Indeed, the Democrats' commitment to government-run health care is all the more menacing to our seniors and our economy when paired with some Democrats' absolute commitment to end enforcement of our immigration laws by abolishing Immigration and Customs Enforcement.",1,20181010_medicare.tsv

38,TRUMP,This radical agenda would destroy American prosperity.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
39,TRUMP,"Under its vision, costs will spiral out of control.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
40,TRUMP,Taxes will skyrocket.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
41,TRUMP,"And Democrats will seek to slash budgets for seniors’ Medicare, Social Security and defense.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv
42,TRUMP,Republicans believe that a Medicare program that was created for seniors and paid for by seniors their entire lives should always be protected and preserved.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
43,TRUMP,I am committed to resolutely defending Medicare and Social Security from the radical socialist plans of the Democrats.,0,20181010_medicare.tsv
44,TRUMP,"For the sake of our country, our prosperity, our seniors and all Americans — this is a fight we must win.",0,20181010_medicare.tsv

26,TRUMP,This is especially true because we have undertaken the most extensive regulatory reduction ever conceived.,1,20182601_trump_world.tsv
27,TRUMP,Regulation is stealth taxation.,0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

28,TRUMP,"The U.S., like many other countries, unelected bureaucrats — and we have — believe me, we have them all over the place — and they’ve imposed crushing and anti-business and anti-worker regulations on our citizens with no vote, no legislative debate, and no real accountability.",0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

32,TRUMP,"Instead of 2 for 1, we have cut 22 burdensome regulations for every 1 new rule.",0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

42,TRUMP,"As the United States pursues domestic reforms to unleash jobs and growth, we are also working to reform the international trading system so that it promotes broadly shared prosperity and rewards to those who play by the rules.",0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

49,TRUMP,We will enforce our trade laws and restore integrity to our trading system.,0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

231,TRUMP,"So I think between that and the tremendous tax cuts, we’ve really done something.",0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

233,TRUMP,And the reason I’m a cheerleader is because it’s easy — because I love our country and I think we’re just doing really well.,0,20182601_trump_world.tsv
234,TRUMP,And we look forward to seeing you in America — special place — and where you are is a special place also.,0,20182601_trump_world.tsv
235,TRUMP,Thank you all very much.,0,20182601_trump_world.tsv
236,TRUMP,I appreciate it.,0,20182601_trump_world.tsv

1,TRUMP,My fellow Americans:,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
2,TRUMP,"Tonight, I am speaking to you because there is a growing humanitarian and security crisis at our southern border.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
3,TRUMP,"Every day, Customs and Border Patrol agents encounter thousands of illegal immigrants trying to enter our country.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
4,TRUMP,"We are out of space to hold them, and we have no way to promptly return them back home to their country.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
5,TRUMP,America proudly welcomes millions of lawful immigrants who enrich our society and contribute to our nation.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
6,TRUMP,"But all Americans are hurt by uncontrolled, illegal migration.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
7,TRUMP,It strains public resources and drives down jobs and wages.,1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
8,TRUMP,Among those hardest hit are African Americans and Hispanic Americans.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
9,TRUMP,"Our southern border is a pipeline for vast quantities of illegal drugs, including meth, heroin, cocaine, and fentanyl.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
10,TRUMP,"Every week, 300 of our citizens are killed by heroin alone, 90 percent of which floods across from our southern border.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
11,TRUMP,More Americans will die from drugs this year than were killed in the entire Vietnam War.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv

12,TRUMP,"In the last two years, ICE officers made 266,000 arrests of aliens with criminal records, including those charged or convicted of 100,000 assaults, 30,000 sex crimes, and 4,000 violent killings.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv

13,TRUMP,"Over the years, thousands of Americans have been brutally killed by those who illegally entered our country, and thousands more lives will be lost if we don’t act right now.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
14,TRUMP,This is a humanitarian crisis — a crisis of the heart and a crisis of the soul.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
15,TRUMP,"Last month, 20,000 migrant children were illegally brought into the United States — a dramatic increase.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
16,TRUMP,These children are used as human pawns by vicious coyotes and ruthless gangs.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
17,TRUMP,One in three women are sexually assaulted on the dangerous trek up through Mexico.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
18,TRUMP,"Women and children are the biggest victims, by far, of our broken system.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
19,TRUMP,This is the tragic reality of illegal immigration on our southern border.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
20,TRUMP,This is the cycle of human suffering that I am determined to end.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
21,TRUMP,"My administration has presented Congress with a detailed proposal to secure the border and stop the criminal gangs, drug smugglers, and human traffickers.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
22,TRUMP,It’s a tremendous problem.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
23,TRUMP,Our proposal was developed by law enforcement professionals and border agents at the Department of Homeland Security.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
24,TRUMP,These are the resources they have requested to properly perform their mission and keep America safe.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
25,TRUMP,"In fact, safer than ever before.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
26,TRUMP,"The proposal from Homeland Security includes cutting-edge technology for detecting drugs, weapons, illegal contraband, and many other things.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
27,TRUMP,"We have requested more agents, immigration judges, and bed space to process the sharp rise in unlawful migration fueled by our very strong economy.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
28,TRUMP,Our plan also contains an urgent request for humanitarian assistance and medical support.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
29,TRUMP,"Furthermore, we have asked Congress to close border security loopholes so that illegal immigrant children can be safely and humanely returned back home.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
30,TRUMP,"Finally, as part of an overall approach to border security, law enforcement professionals have requested $5.7 billion for a physical barrier.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
31,TRUMP,"At the request of Democrats, it will be a steel barrier rather than a concrete wall.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
32,TRUMP,This barrier is absolutely critical to border security.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
33,TRUMP,It’s also what our professionals at the border want and need.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
34,TRUMP,This is just common sense.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
35,TRUMP,The border wall would very quickly pay for itself.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
36,TRUMP,The cost of illegal drugs exceeds $500 billion a year — vastly more than the $5.7 billion we have requested from Congress.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
37,TRUMP,"The wall will also be paid for, indirectly, by the great new trade deal we have made with Mexico.",1,20190108_oval_office.tsv
38,TRUMP,"Senator Chuck Schumer — who you will be hearing from later tonight — has repeatedly supported a physical barrier in the past, along with many other Democrats.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
39,TRUMP,They changed their mind only after I was elected President.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
40,TRUMP,Democrats in Congress have refused to acknowledge the crisis.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
41,TRUMP,And they have refused to provide our brave border agents with the tools they desperately need to protect our families and our nation.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
42,TRUMP,The federal government remains shut down for one reason and one reason only: because Democrats will not fund border security.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
43,TRUMP,My administration is doing everything in our power to help those impacted by the situation.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
44,TRUMP,But the only solution is for Democrats to pass a spending bill that defends our borders and re-opens the government.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
45,TRUMP,This situation could be solved in a 45-minute meeting.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
46,TRUMP,I have invited Congressional leadership to the White House tomorrow to get this done.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
47,TRUMP,"Hopefully, we can rise above partisan politics in order to support national security.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
48,TRUMP,Some have suggested a barrier is immoral.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
49,TRUMP,"Then why do wealthy politicians build walls, fences, and gates around their homes?",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
50,TRUMP,"They don’t build walls because they hate the people on the outside, but because they love the people on the inside.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
51,TRUMP,The only thing that is immoral is the politicians to do nothing and continue to allow more innocent people to be so horribly victimized.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv

52,TRUMP,"America’s heart broke the day after Christmas when a young police officer in California was savagely murdered in cold blood by an illegal alien, who just came across the border.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
53,TRUMP,The life of an American hero was stolen by someone who had no right to be in our country.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
54,TRUMP,"Day after day, precious lives are cut short by those who have violated our borders.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
55,TRUMP,"In California, an Air Force veteran was raped, murdered, and beaten to death with a hammer by an illegal alien with a long criminal history.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
56,TRUMP,"In Georgia, an illegal alien was recently charged with murder for killing, beheading, and dismembering his neighbor.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv

57,TRUMP,"In Maryland, MS-13 gang members who arrived in the United States as unaccompanied minors were arrested and charged last year after viciously stabbing and beating a 16-year-old girl.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
58,TRUMP,"Over the last several years, I’ve met with dozens of families whose loved ones were stolen by illegal immigration.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
59,TRUMP,I’ve held the hands of the weeping mothers and embraced the grief-stricken fathers.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
60,TRUMP,So sad.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
61,TRUMP,So terrible.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
62,TRUMP,"I will never forget the pain in their eyes, the tremble in their voices, and the sadness gripping their souls.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
63,TRUMP,How much more American blood must we shed before Congress does its job?,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv

64,TRUMP,"To those who refuse to compromise in the name of border security, I would ask: Imagine if it was your child, your husband, or your wife whose life was so cruelly shattered and totally broken?",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
65,TRUMP,To every member of Congress: Pass a bill that ends this crisis.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
66,TRUMP,"To every citizen: Call Congress and tell them to finally, after all of these decades, secure our border.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
67,TRUMP,"This is a choice between right and wrong, justice and injustice.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
68,TRUMP,This is about whether we fulfill our sacred duty to the American citizens we serve.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
69,TRUMP,"When I took the Oath of Office, I swore to protect our country.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
70,TRUMP,"And that is what I will always do, so help me God.",0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
71,TRUMP,Thank you and goodnight.,0,20190108_oval_office.tsv
